name: Range Shoot: Sniper Pro
description:
Range Shoot: Sniper Pro is about a shooting commander journey who becomes an elite commando with alot target shooting skills.This 3D simulation target shooting game is all about defeating the shooter challenges by shooting right across the targets in FPS ( First Person Shooting ), which will get difficulty level more and more as you advance with your elite skills and sniper shooting weapons to hit the targets.
Features of the game:

- different weapons and guns to choose from
- more than 50 levels
- realistic guns, sounds and backgrounds
- high resolution graphics
- training mode
